docs.title: Welcome to docs.logiudice.me
docs.text: I created this site to help track some personal documentation, and thought that sharing this with the outside world may help someone.

docs.title: Adding images.
docs.text:
Upload to assets folder, then use similar to below to embed into md.

![[Pasted image 20241017185141.png]]

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Code Blocks in Content Tabs
Flowcharts
docs.text:
graph LR
  A[Start] --> B{Failure?};
  B -->|Yes| C[Investigate...];
  C --> D[Debug];
  D --> B;
  B ---->|No| E[Success!];

docs.title: Sequence Diagrams
docs.text:
sequenceDiagram
  autonumber
  Server->>Terminal: Send request
  loop Health
      Terminal->>Terminal: Check for health
  end
  Note right of Terminal: System online
  Terminal-->>Server: Everything is OK
  Terminal->>Database: Request customer data
  Database-->>Terminal: Customer data

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Please follow one of the guides below to configure WLED.

docs.title: Download and Install mobile app
docs.text:
AppleAndroid
  1. Go to the app store and download the WLED app
    • WLED Native on the App Store (apple.com)
  1. Go to the app store and download the WLED app
    • WLED – Apps on Google Play
  2. Once downloaded, open the app and press the icon at the top right
